strings.Value: "It is amazing what the Stag Lord has achieved with such crude methods. Imagine what we might do, with lawful power in our hands..."
"Worms fighting over a decaying corpse. Pointless."
"The bandits prey on the weak and flee from the strong. We'll kill them in no time."
"Power is lawful when it obeys the laws. â€” Evil, when it twists them to fill the treasury with gold.
